下面是优化后的文本，使其更加清晰、连贯和专业：

---

**DO NOT MODIFY THIS FILE! It was generated by help2man 1.48.5.**

**This file was generated with po4a. Translate the source file.**

.TH USERS 1 "September 2022" "GNU coreutils 9.1" "User Commands"

.SH NAME
users \- Display the names of users currently logged in on the system

.SH SYNOPSIS
\fBusers\fP [\fI\,options\/\fP]... [\fI\,file\/\fP]

.SH DESCRIPTION
The \fBusers\fP command displays the names of users who are currently logged in on the system. If no file is specified, it uses \fI/var/run/utmp\fP by default. A common alternative file to specify is \fI/var/log/wtmp\fP.

.TP
\fB\-\-help\fP
Display this help message and exit.

.TP
\fB\-\-version\fP
Display version information and exit.

.SH AUTHORS
Written by Joseph Arceneaux and David MacKenzie.

.SH REPORTING BUGS
For online help and bug reports for GNU coreutils, please visit:
.br
<https://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/>

.SH COPYRIGHT
Copyright (C) 2022 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
License GPLv3+: GNU GPL version 3 or later <https://gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html>.
This is free software: you are free to change and redistribute it. There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.

.SH SEE ALSO
\fBgetent\fP(1), \fBwho\fP(1)

.PP
For complete documentation, see:
.br
<https://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/users>
.br
or use the local command: info '(coreutils) users invocation'

---

主要的改进包括：
1. 修正了日期格式。
2. 改进了句子结构，使其更流畅。
3. 统一了命令选项的格式。
4. 添加了完整的网址链接以便用户访问。
5. 调整了一些标点符号以符合英文书写习惯。
